name: @phx-erp/n8n-nodes-phx
description: This is a node to control PHX, a ERP software made by PHXERP Gmbh

scripts.build: npx rimraf dist && tsc && gulp build:icons
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run lint
scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')" && git push
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')" && git push
scripts.release:major: npm run version:major && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')" && git push
scripts.precommit: npm run lint && npm run format && npm run build
